Columbia River Tackle - Weighted Snagging Treble Hooks, Classic 10/0 8/0 6/0 - AKRDY

$1.50 – $1.75

These Columbia River Tackle weighted treble hooks are great for snagging salmon at Seward, Prince William Sound, and anywhere else snagging is legal in Alaska. The 10/0 are bigger than the 6/0. Get pink salmon, silver salmon, or King Salmon with these hooks.

Clear

— OR —

  • Description
  • Additional information
  • Reviews (0)

Description

These snagging hooks resemble the standard setup with the weight attached to the main shaft of the hook. These come in 10/0, 8/0, and 6/0 weighted snagging hooks. Made in Palmer, AK by Columbia River Tackle.

***FREE SHIPPING TO JBER***

Columbia River Tackle – Weighted Snagging Treble Hooks, Classic 10/0 8/0 6/0 – AKRDY
